languages.text: "С подобным мы прежде не сталкивались. Мор касается лишь механизмов, заставляя их преображаться и терять функциональность. Никто не знает природы этой заразы и того, откуда она взялась в секретном цеху Леди Теодоры. Возможно, там велись какие-то тайные изыскания".

"We have not faced anything like this before. The plague only affects mechanisms, forcing them to transform and lose all functionality. No one has been able to provide insight into the nature of this disease or how it found its way into Lady Theodora's secret workshop. It is possible that some secret research was being carried out there."
languages.original_text: "С подобным мы прежде не сталкивались. Мор касается лишь механизмов, заставляя их преображаться и терять функциональность. Никто не знает природы этой заразы и того, откуда она взялась в секретном цеху Леди Теодоры. Возможно, там велись какие-то тайные изыскания".

traits.locale_text: "We did not face anything like this before. The plague only affects the mechanisms, forcing them to transform and lose their functionality. Nobody knows the nature of this disease and how it had found its' way to Lady Theodora's secret guild. It is possible that some secret research have been carried out there."

"We did not face anything like this before. The plague only affects the mechanisms, forcing them to transform and lose their functionality. Nobody knows the nature of this disease and how it had found its' way to Lady Theodora's secret guild. It is possible that some secret research have been carried out there."

"We have not faced anything like this before. The plague only affects mechanisms, forcing them to transform and lose all functionality. No one has been able to provide insight into the nature of this disease or how it found its way into Lady Theodora's secret workshop. It is possible that some secret research was being carried out there."

Nobody knows the nature of this disease and how it found its' way into Lady Theodora's secret workshop. It is possible that some secret research was being carried out there."

No one has been able to provide insight into the nature of this disease or how it found its way into Lady Theodora's secret workshop. It is possible that some secret research was being carried out there."

"We have not faced anything like this before. The plague only affects mechanisms, forcing them to transform and lose all functionality. No one has been able to provide insight into the nature of this disease or how it found its way into Lady Theodora's secret workshop. It is possible that some secret research was being carried out there."

"We have not faced anything like this before. The plague only affects mechanisms, forcing them to transform and lose all functionality. No one has been able to provide insight into the nature of this disease or how it found its way into Lady Theodora's secret workshop. It is possible that some secret research was being carried out there."

languages.text: “我们以前从来没遭遇过这样的事情。这场瘟疫只会影响机械，迫使它们变形，失去所有原有功能。没人了解这场疾病究竟是什么引起的，也没人知道它怎么会在西奥多拉夫人的秘密车间中爆发。某些人猜测，那里之前可能进行过某种秘密研究。”
languages.original_text: "We have not faced anything like this before. The plague only affects mechanisms, forcing them to transform and lose all functionality. No one has been able to provide insight into the nature of this disease or how it found its way into Lady Theodora's secret workshop. It is possible that some secret research was being carried out there."

traits.locale_text: “我们以前从来没遭遇过这样的事情。这场瘟疫只会影响机械，迫使它们变形，失去所有原有功能。没人了解这场疾病究竟是什么引起的，也没人知道它怎么会在西奥多拉夫人的秘密车间中爆发。某些人猜测，那里之前可能进行过某种秘密研究。”
“我们以前从来没遭遇过这样的事情。这场瘟疫只会影响机械，迫使它们变形，失去所有原有功能。没人知道这场疫病的本质，也没人知道怎么会出现在西奥多拉夫人的秘密车间之中。有一种猜测是，那里之前可能进行过某种秘密研究。”

languages.text: «Nunca antes nos habíamos enfrentado a algo así. La plaga solo afecta a los mecanismos, obligándolos a transformarse y perder toda funcionalidad. Nadie ha conseguido averiguar nada sobre la naturaleza de esta enfermedad ni sobre cómo llegó al taller secreto de lady Theodora. Es posible que estuvieran realizando una investigación secreta».
languages.original_text: "We have not faced anything like this before. The plague only affects mechanisms, forcing them to transform and lose all functionality. No one has been able to provide insight into the nature of this disease or how it found its way into Lady Theodora's secret workshop. It is possible that some secret research was being carried out there."

traits.locale_text: «Nunca antes nos habíamos enfrentado a algo así. La plaga solo afecta a los mecanismos, obligándolos a transformarse y perder toda funcionalidad. Nadie ha conseguido averiguar nada sobre la naturaleza de esta enfermedad ni sobre cómo llegó al taller secreto de lady Theodora. Es posible que estuvieran realizando una investigación secreta».

languages.text: 「こんな事態に直面したのは初めてだ。疫病は機構にのみ影響を及ぼして無理やり変形させ、すべての機能を失わせる。この病気がどのような性質で、どのようにしてレディ・シオドーラの秘密工房に入り込んだのか、誰も知らないんだ。そこで秘密の研究が行われていた可能性もあるぞ」
languages.original_text: "We have not faced anything like this before. The plague only affects mechanisms, forcing them to transform and lose all functionality. No one has been able to provide insight into the nature of this disease or how it found its way into Lady Theodora's secret workshop. It is possible that some secret research was being carried out there."

traits.locale_text: 「こんな事態に直面したのは初めてだ。疫病は機構にのみ影響を及ぼして無理やり変形させ、すべての機能を失わせる。この病気がどのような性質で、どのようにしてレディ・シオドーラの秘密工房に入り込んだのか、誰も知らないんだ。そこで秘密の研究が行われていた可能性もあるぞ」
「こんな事態に直面したのは初めてだ。疫病は機構にのみ影響を及ぼして無理やり変形させ、すべての機能を失わせる。この病気がどのような性質で、どのようにしてレディ・シオドーラの秘密工房に入り込んだのか、誰も知らないんだ。そこで秘密の研究が行われていた可能性もあるぞ」

languages.text: « Nous sommes face à un phénomène totalement inédit. La lèpre affecte uniquement les mécanismes, les faisant muter et perdre toutes leurs fonctionnalités. Personne n'a encore su nous en dire plus sur cette maladie, ni sur la façon dont elle s'est retrouvée dans l'atelier secret de dame Théodora. On suppose qu'elle y menait quelque projet de recherche secret. »
languages.original_text: "We have not faced anything like this before. The plague only affects mechanisms, forcing them to transform and lose all functionality. No one has been able to provide insight into the nature of this disease or how it found its way into Lady Theodora's secret workshop. It is possible that some secret research was being carried out there."

traits.locale_text: « Nous sommes face à un phénomène totalement inédit. La lèpre affecte uniquement les mécanismes, les faisant muter et perdre toutes leurs fonctionnalités. Personne n'a encore su nous en dire plus sur cette maladie, ni sur la façon dont elle s'est retrouvée dans l'atelier secret de dame Théodora. On suppose qu'elle y menait quelque projet de recherche secret. »

languages.text: "Wir hatten noch nie mit etwas Derartigem zu tun. Die Seuche wirkt sich nur auf Mechanismen aus. Sie zwingt sie, sich zu verwandeln und jede Funktionalität zu verlieren. Niemand hat Einblicke in das Wesen dieser Krankheit und niemand weiß, wie sie in Lady Theodoras geheime Werkstatt gelangt ist. Möglicherweise wurden dort geheime Forschungen durchgeführt."
languages.original_text: "We have not faced anything like this before. The plague only affects mechanisms, forcing them to transform and lose all functionality. No one has been able to provide insight into the nature of this disease or how it found its way into Lady Theodora's secret workshop. It is possible that some secret research was being carried out there."

traits.locale_text: "Wir hatten noch nie mit etwas Derartigem zu tun. Die Seuche wirkt sich nur auf Mechanismen aus. Sie zwingt sie, sich zu verwandeln und jede Funktionalität zu verlieren. Niemand hat Einblicke in das Wesen dieser Krankheit und niemand weiß, wie sie in Lady Theodoras geheime Werkstatt gelangt ist. Möglicherweise wurden dort geheime Forschungen durchgeführt."

"Wir hatten noch nie mit etwas Derartigem zu tun. Die Seuche wirkt sich nur auf Mechanismen aus. Sie zwingt sie, sich zu verwandeln und alle Funktionalität zu verlieren. Niemand versteht diese Krankheit, niemand weiß, wie sie in Lady Theodoras geheime Werkstatt gelangt ist. Möglicherweise wurden dort geheime Forschungen durchgeführt."

languages.text: "Daha evvel böyle bir şeyle karşılaşmamıştık. Salgın yalnızca mekanizmaları etkiliyor, dönüşmelerine ve tüm işlevlerini kaybetmelerine yol açıyor. Hastalığın doğasına dair bilgi paylaşabilen yahut Leydi Theodora'nın gizli atölyesine nasıl girdiğini bilen kimse yok. Orada gizli kapaklı araştırmalar yapılmış olabilir."
languages.original_text: "We have not faced anything like this before. The plague only affects mechanisms, forcing them to transform and lose all functionality. No one has been able to provide insight into the nature of this disease or how it found its way into Lady Theodora's secret workshop. It is possible that some secret research was being carried out there."

traits.locale_text: "Daha evvel böyle bir şeyle karşılaşmamıştık. Salgın yalnızca mekanizmaları etkiliyor, dönüşmelerine ve tüm işlevlerini kaybetmelerine yol açıyor. Hastalığın doğasına dair bilgi paylaşabilen yahut Leydi Theodora'nın gizli atölyesine nasıl girdiğini bilen kimse yok. Orada gizli kapaklı araştırmalar yapılmış olabilir."
